importExportForm.importFormatAuthorized: Offline: geojson, kml and gpx only, otherwise, authorized formats are: geojson, kml, gpx, gml, shapefile

aboutTool.html:
The mission of the Ministère des Transports is to ensure the sustainable mobility of people throughout the territory. and goods through efficient and safe transportation systems that contribute to the development of Quebec.
Help: User manual
Changelog
Support: geomatique@transports.gouv.qc.ca


Version: {{version.app}}

warning.title: Warning - This tool is only availaible online

searchResultsTool.examples:
You must be online to perform text searches. Searches by coordinates (-68.165547, 48.644546) can be done offline.

Here are some examples:

iSearch: Address, postal code, municipality, place, intersections, etc. :
  • 5833 Pierre-Bertrand
  • H2L0A1
  • Saint-Césaire
  • magog hospital
  • McDo Lévis
  • main + church (one intersection)
Partial road number or RTSS and precise chaining:
  • 0005001070000D+8090
  • 00138-01-106-000C< /li>
  • 5001070000D+8090
KM marker:
  • Lévis#km, 20#km, 20-314#km, 20 314#km, 314#km
Coordinates:
  • Decimal degree (-68.165547, 48.644546)
  • Degree minute second (-68 9 56, 48 38 40)
  • Degree decimal minute (-68 9.56, 48 38.40)
  • UTM (UTM-19 561466.861, 5388278.862)
  • MTM (MTM-6 255776.67 5389766.47)
  • MTM ( MTM6 255776.67 5389766.47)
  • Google Projection (-7588142.43 6214761.09;3857)
  • Lambert MTQ (935103.79 517928.39;3798)
  • Lambert Quebec (111594.635.484, 9798) )
You can also use keywords to refine your search. Examples:
  • #mun québec (to search for a municipality)
  • #sante Lévis (to search for a health establishment)
  • #cpe Joyeux (to search for a center Early Childhood)
*Keywords appear in the Search Options menu when hovering over a Result Type.
